cleaned_text: Help. Don't guess what you should do. Get accurate Poison Control answers online or by phone. Both are free and confidential. [Get HELP ONLINE](https://triage.webpoisoncontrol.org/#/reset) or CALL 1-800-222-1222 Connect with us on social media! Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter for news, updates, and events! Text POISON to 202-677-7600 Save the poison control number and the link to online help NOW! Text-to-save or download directly to save our vcard to your computer and smartphone contacts. [Download Poison Control vcard](https://vcrd.co/poison/4222/d) Get the App! Download the free webPOISONCONTROL® app. [ ](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id959075009) Common and dangerous poisons Know your poisons! Which are common? Which are the most dangerous? Keep your child safe. [Watch out for these poisons!](https://www.poison.org/common-and-dangerous-poisons) Subscribe to The Poison Post® The Poison Post® is a free, quarterly e-newsletter delivering poison prevention tips right to your inbox! [The Poison Post](https://www.poison.org/the-poison-post) Learn the Poison Prevention Jingles Learn the Poison Help jingle in English or Spanish. Use these jingles to teach the Poison Control number: 1-800-222-1222. Available for download. [Jingles](https://www.poison.org/jingles) What happens when I call Poison Control? Poison Control is available 24 hours a day to provide free, expert and confidential guidance in a poison emergency. When you call, a poison specialist will ask you questions to determine the severity of your case, then provide recommendations. [What happens when I call?](https://www.poison.org/calling-poison-control) What is 1-800-222-1222? Call 1-800-222-1222 to reach Poison Control anywhere in the United States. [What is 1-800-222-1222?](https://www.poison.org/18002221222) Support Us Help us save lives! Donate now so we can continue to provide 24/7 expert help for poison emergencies. Your donation to our 501(c)(3) charitable organization will keep the phone lines open and the app online. [Donate Now](https://secure.qgiv.com/for/poison/) Hospital supporters Hospitals frequently call Poison Control for medical guidance.
